org.fest.swing
Interface ComponentMatcher

All Superinterfaces:
abbot.finder.Matcher
All Known Implementing Classes:
NameMatcher, TypeMatcher
public interface ComponentMatcher
extends abbot.finder.Matcher

Understands an indication whether a Component matches some desired criteria.

Author:
Alex Ruiz

Method Summary
 boolean matches(Component c)
          Verifies that the given Component matches some lookup criteria.
 

Method Detail

matches

boolean matches(Component c)
Verifies that the given Component matches some lookup criteria.

Specified by:
matches in interface abbot.finder.Matcher
Parameters:
c - the Component to verify.
Returns:
true if the given Component matches some lookup criteria, otherwise false.
